about_the_game:
Fight your way to freedom as Trantor ... The Last Storm Trooper!

You're commander of an Earth ship sent to an alien planet to retrieve stolen missile plans, As you leave the ship, it blows up taking your entire crew with it!
Now, you must complete the mission alone...

Race against time in the roughest and toughest test of your storm trooper career! Disarm the microscopic body bomb implanted under your skin! Blast away the murderous creatures using your powerful flame thrower! Search the endless corridors of the alien superstructure and find the computer terminals that hold the key to the stolen missile plans ... and your life!

Push your reflexes to the limit as never before as you battle impossible odds to reach your final objective ... freedom!

FEATURES

- Beat the clock! You have 90 seconds to reach each terminal
- Use your trusty flamethrower to run & gun past enemies
- Find lockers to restock on fuel and health

Fight your way to freedom as Trantor ... The Last Storm Trooper!

You're commander of an Earth ship sent to an alien planet to retrieve stolen missile plans, As you leave the ship, it blows up taking your entire crew with it!
Now, you must complete the mission alone...

Race against time in the roughest and toughest test of your storm trooper career! Disarm the microscopic body bomb implanted under your skin! Blast away the murderous creatures using your powerful flame thrower! Search the endless corridors of the alien superstructure and find the computer terminals that hold the key to the stolen missile plans ... and your life!

Push your reflexes to the limit as never before as you battle impossible odds to reach your final objective ... freedom!

name: Trantor: The Last Stormtrooper

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any 100% Open GL capable (Card on Onboard)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 3D graphics card or onboard graphics compatible with DirectX 9.0c
  • Additional Notes: 100% DirectX 9 compatible card or onboard sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any 100% Open GL capable (Card on Onboard)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 3D graphics card or onboard graphics compatible with DirectX 9.0c
  • Additional Notes: 100% DirectX 9 compatible card or onboard sound

short_description: Betrayed by his people, TRANTOR is abandoned alone on an Alien planet. His only chance of escape is to actvate the planet's main computer that lies within the terminal building. Armed only with a flame thrower, fight your way to freedom as TRANTOR...THE LAST STORMTROOPER.
